MakeMe Developer's Guide

The Guide contains the following topics:

Topic Description
Compiling SourcesCompiling sources into libraries.
Creating LibrariesHow to create shared and static libraries.
Creating ExecutablesHow to build executables.
ScriptsHow to create build scripts.
Copying FilesHow to copy files and directories.
Configurable ProjectsHow to create a configurable project
MakeMe PluginsCreating plugings to enhance MakeMe.
Generating MakefilesGenerating Makefiles and IDE projects.
Sample MakeMe FilesMakeMe file projects and snippets.
